from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QApplication, QMainWindow, QWidget, QTabWidget, QVBoxLayout, QPushButton, QFormLayout,
    QLineEdit, QMessageBox, QTreeView, QComboBox, QLabel, QHBoxLayout, QFrame, QTableWidget,
    QTableWidgetItem, QDialog
)
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt
from classes import Student, Instructor, Course
import sqlite3
import sys
import csv



[docs]
class SchoolManagementSystem(QMainWindow):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()

        # Establish SQLite database connection
        self.conn = sqlite3.connect('school_management.db')
        self.cursor = self.conn.cursor()

        self.init_db()
        self.initUI()



[docs]
    def initUI(self):
        self.setWindowTitle('School Management System')
        self.setGeometry(100, 100, 800, 600)

        # Main layout
        self.centralWidget = QWidget(self)
        self.setCentralWidget(self.centralWidget)
        self.layout = QVBoxLayout(self.centralWidget)

        # Tab widget
        self.tabs = QTabWidget()
        self.layout.addWidget(self.tabs)

        # Main tab
        self.main_tab = QWidget()
        self.tabs.addTab(self.main_tab, "Main")
        self.main_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.main_tab)

        # Records tab
        self.records_tab = QWidget()
        self.tabs.addTab(self.records_tab, "Records")
        self.records_layout = QVBoxLayout(self.records_tab)

        self.initMainTabUI()
        self.initRecordsTabUI()





[docs]
    def init_db(self):
        # Create tables for students, instructors, and courses
        self.cursor.execute('''
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS students (
                student_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
                name TEXT,
                age INTEGER,
                email TEXT
            )
        ''')
        
        self.cursor.execute('''
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS instructors (
                instructor_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
                name TEXT,
                age INTEGER,
                email TEXT
            )
        ''')

        self.cursor.execute('''
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS courses (
                course_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
                course_name TEXT,
                instructor_id INTEGER,
                FOREIGN KEY(instructor_id) REFERENCES instructors(instructor_id)
            )
        ''')

        self.cursor.execute('''
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS course_enrollments (
                course_id INTEGER,
                student_id INTEGER,
                FOREIGN KEY(course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id),
                FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
            )
        ''')

        self.conn.commit()



    # Close the connection on exit


[docs]
    def closeEvent(self, event):
        self.conn.close()

    def initMainTabUI(self):
        # Save and Load buttons
        option_button_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.main_layout.addLayout(option_button_layout)

        load_button = QPushButton('Backup Data')
        load_button.clicked.connect(self.backup_data)
        option_button_layout.addWidget(load_button)

        export_button = QPushButton('Export Data as CSV')
        export_button.clicked.connect(self.export_data_as_csv)
        option_button_layout.addWidget(export_button)

        # Add buttons for Student, Instructor, Course
        add_button_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.main_layout.addLayout(add_button_layout)

        student_button = QPushButton('Add Student')
        student_button.clicked.connect(self.student_window)
        add_button_layout.addWidget(student_button)

        instructor_button = QPushButton('Add Instructor')
        instructor_button.clicked.connect(self.instructor_window)
        add_button_layout.addWidget(instructor_button)

        course_button = QPushButton('Add Course')
        course_button.clicked.connect(self.course_window)
        add_button_layout.addWidget(course_button)

        # Add Student Registration for Course section
        self.initStudentRegistrationUI()

        # Add Instructor Assignment to Course section
        self.initInstructorAssignmentUI()

    def initStudentRegistrationUI(self):
        # Title
        course_registration_label = QLabel("Student Registration for Course")
        course_registration_label.setStyleSheet("font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px;")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(course_registration_label)

        # Student Name Entry
        student_name_for_course_label = QLabel("Student Name")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(student_name_for_course_label)
        self.student_name_for_course_entry = QLineEdit()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.student_name_for_course_entry)

        # Course Dropdown
        self.selected_course = QComboBox(self)
        self.update_course_combobox()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.selected_course)

        # Register Button
        register_button = QPushButton("Register")
        register_button.clicked.connect(self.register_course)
        self.main_layout.addWidget(register_button)





[docs]
    def initInstructorAssignmentUI(self):
        # Title
        instructor_assignment_label = QLabel("Instructor Assignment to Course")
        instructor_assignment_label.setStyleSheet("font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px;")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(instructor_assignment_label)

        # Instructor Name Entry
        instructor_name_for_course_label = QLabel("Instructor Name")
        self.main_layout.addWidget(instructor_name_for_course_label)
        self.instructor_name_for_course_entry = QLineEdit()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.instructor_name_for_course_entry)

        # Course Dropdown
        self.selected_course_for_instructor = QComboBox(self)
        self.update_course_combobox_for_instructor()
        self.main_layout.addWidget(self.selected_course_for_instructor)

        # Assign Button
        assign_button = QPushButton("Assign")
        assign_button.clicked.connect(self.assign_instructor_to_course)
        self.main_layout.addWidget(assign_button)





[docs]
    def register_course(self):
        student_name = self.student_name_for_course_entry.text()
        selected_course_name = self.selected_course.currentText()

        # Retrieve student by name from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE name = ?", (student_name,))
        student_data = self.cursor.fetchone()

        # Retrieve course by name from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT course_id FROM courses WHERE course_name = ?", (selected_course_name,))
        course_data = self.cursor.fetchone()

        if student_data and course_data:
            student_id = student_data[0]
            course_id = course_data[0]

            # Insert the student into the course enrollments table
            self.cursor.execute("INSERT INTO course_enrollments (course_id, student_id) VALUES (?, ?)", 
                                (course_id, student_id))
            self.conn.commit()

            QMessageBox.information(self, "Success", f"{student_name} has been registered for {selected_course_name}.")
        else:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Error", "Student or Course not found.")





[docs]
    def assign_instructor_to_course(self):
        instructor_name = self.instructor_name_for_course_entry.text()
        selected_course_name = self.selected_course_for_instructor.currentText()

        # Retrieve instructor by name from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT instructor_id FROM instructors WHERE name = ?", (instructor_name,))
        instructor_data = self.cursor.fetchone()

        # Retrieve course by name from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT course_id FROM courses WHERE course_name = ?", (selected_course_name,))
        course_data = self.cursor.fetchone()

        if instructor_data and course_data:
            instructor_id = instructor_data[0]
            course_id = course_data[0]

            # Update the course with the assigned instructor
            self.cursor.execute("UPDATE courses SET instructor_id = ? WHERE course_id = ?", 
                                (instructor_id, course_id))
            self.conn.commit()

            QMessageBox.information(self, "Success", f"{instructor_name} has been assigned to {selected_course_name}.")
        else:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Error", "Instructor or Course not found.")





[docs]
    def update_course_combobox(self):
        self.selected_course.clear()

        # Fetch all courses from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT course_name FROM courses")
        courses = self.cursor.fetchall()

        if courses:
            # Add all courses to the combobox
            self.selected_course.addItems([course[0] for course in courses])
        else:
            self.selected_course.addItem("No Courses Available")





[docs]
    def update_course_combobox_for_instructor(self):
        self.selected_course_for_instructor.clear()

        # Fetch all courses from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT course_name FROM courses")
        courses = self.cursor.fetchall()

        if courses:
            # Add all courses to the instructor's course combobox
            self.selected_course_for_instructor.addItems([course[0] for course in courses])
        else:
            self.selected_course_for_instructor.addItem("No Courses Available")





[docs]
    def export_data_as_csv(self):
        # File path for the exported CSV
        file_path = "school_data.csv"
        
        try:
            with open(file_path, mode='w', newline='') as file:
                writer = csv.writer(file)
                
                # Export Students
                writer.writerow(["Students"])
                writer.writerow(["Name", "Age", "Email", "Student ID"])
                self.cursor.execute("SELECT name, age, email, student_id FROM students")
                students = self.cursor.fetchall()
                for student in students:
                    writer.writerow(student)

                writer.writerow([])  # Empty row between sections

                # Export Instructors
                writer.writerow(["Instructors"])
                writer.writerow(["Name", "Age", "Email", "Instructor ID"])
                self.cursor.execute("SELECT name, age, email, instructor_id FROM instructors")
                instructors = self.cursor.fetchall()
                for instructor in instructors:
                    writer.writerow(instructor)

                writer.writerow([])  # Empty row between sections

                # Export Courses with Instructor and Enrolled Students
                writer.writerow(["Courses"])
                writer.writerow(["Course ID", "Course Name", "Instructor", "Enrolled Students"])
                self.cursor.execute("""
                    SELECT courses.course_id, courses.course_name, instructors.name 
                    FROM courses
                    LEFT JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id
                """)
                courses = self.cursor.fetchall()
                for course in courses:
                    course_id, course_name, instructor_name = course
                    instructor_name = instructor_name if instructor_name else "None"

                    # Get enrolled students for each course
                    self.cursor.execute("""
                        SELECT students.name FROM course_enrollments
                        JOIN students ON course_enrollments.student_id = students.student_id
                        WHERE course_enrollments.course_id = ?
                    """, (course_id,))
                    enrolled_students = self.cursor.fetchall()
                    enrolled_students_names = ", ".join([student[0] for student in enrolled_students])
                    
                    writer.writerow([course_id, course_name, instructor_name, enrolled_students_names])

            QMessageBox.information(self, "Success", f"Data exported successfully to {file_path}.")

        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Error", f"An error occurred while exporting: {e}")





[docs]
    def initRecordsTabUI(self):
        # Search Bar and Button
        self.search_entry = QLineEdit()
        self.records_layout.addWidget(self.search_entry)

        search_button = QPushButton('Search')
        search_button.clicked.connect(self.search_records)
        self.records_layout.addWidget(search_button)

        # Tree View for displaying records
        self.table = QTableWidget()
        self.table.setColumnCount(4)
        self.table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(["Type", "Name", "Age", "ID"])
        self.records_layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Delete Button
        delete_button = QPushButton('Delete')
        delete_button.clicked.connect(self.delete_record)
        self.records_layout.addWidget(delete_button)





[docs]
    def backup_data(self):
        try:
            # Open a connection to the backup database
            backup_db = sqlite3.connect('school_management_backup.db')

            # Perform the backup
            with backup_db:
                self.conn.backup(backup_db)

            backup_db.close()
            
            QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', 'Backup created successfully!')

        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', f'An error occurred during the backup: {e}')






[docs]
    def student_window(self):
        dialog = QDialog(self)
        dialog.setWindowTitle("Add Student")
        dialog.setGeometry(300, 300, 300, 300)

        layout = QFormLayout()
        dialog.setLayout(layout)

        name_entry = QLineEdit()
        age_entry = QLineEdit()
        email_entry = QLineEdit()
        id_entry = QLineEdit()

        layout.addRow('Name:', name_entry)
        layout.addRow('Age:', age_entry)
        layout.addRow('Email:', email_entry)
        layout.addRow('Student ID:', id_entry)

        submit_button = QPushButton('Submit')
        submit_button.clicked.connect(lambda: self.add_student(name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog))
        layout.addWidget(submit_button)

        dialog.exec_()





[docs]
    def add_student(self, name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog):
        name = name_entry.text()
        age = int(age_entry.text())
        email = email_entry.text()
        student_id = int(id_entry.text())

        # Create a Student instance
        student = Student(name, age, email, student_id)

        # Insert the student into the database (if using SQLite)
        self.cursor.execute("INSERT INTO students (student_id, name, age, email) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)",
                            (student.student_id, student.name, student.age, student.email))
        self.conn.commit()

        # Add the student to the internal list
        self.students.append(student)

        dialog.close()
        self.refresh_treeview()

    def instructor_window(self):
        dialog = QDialog(self)
        dialog.setWindowTitle("Add Instructor")
        dialog.setGeometry(300, 300, 300, 300)

        layout = QFormLayout()
        dialog.setLayout(layout)

        name_entry = QLineEdit()
        age_entry = QLineEdit()
        email_entry = QLineEdit()
        id_entry = QLineEdit()

        layout.addRow('Name:', name_entry)
        layout.addRow('Age:', age_entry)
        layout.addRow('Email:', email_entry)
        layout.addRow('Instructor ID:', id_entry)

        submit_button = QPushButton('Submit')
        submit_button.clicked.connect(lambda: self.add_instructor(name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog))
        layout.addWidget(submit_button)

        dialog.exec_()





[docs]
    def add_instructor(self, name_entry, age_entry, email_entry, id_entry, dialog):
        name = name_entry.text()
        age = int(age_entry.text())
        email = email_entry.text()
        instructor_id = int(id_entry.text())

        # Create an Instructor instance
        instructor = Instructor(name, age, email, instructor_id)

        # Insert the instructor into the database
        self.cursor.execute("INSERT INTO instructors (instructor_id, name, age, email) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)",
                            (instructor.instructor_id, instructor.name, instructor.age, instructor.email))
        self.conn.commit()

        # Add the instructor to the internal list
        self.instructors.append(instructor)

        dialog.close()
        self.refresh_treeview()

    def course_window(self):
        dialog = QDialog(self)
        dialog.setWindowTitle("Add Course")
        dialog.setGeometry(300, 300, 300, 200)

        layout = QFormLayout()
        dialog.setLayout(layout)

        course_id_entry = QLineEdit()
        course_name_entry = QLineEdit()

        layout.addRow('Course ID:', course_id_entry)
        layout.addRow('Course Name:', course_name_entry)

        submit_button = QPushButton('Submit')
        submit_button.clicked.connect(lambda: self.add_course(course_id_entry, course_name_entry, dialog))
        layout.addWidget(submit_button)

        dialog.exec_()





[docs]
    def add_course(self, course_id_entry, course_name_entry, dialog):
        course_id = int(course_id_entry.text())
        course_name = course_name_entry.text()

        instructor = self.instructors[0] if self.instructors else None  # Assign the first instructor, or none if no instructors exist

        # Create a Course instance
        course = Course(course_id, course_name, instructor)

        # Insert the course into the database
        self.cursor.execute("INSERT INTO courses (course_id, course_name, instructor_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?)",
                            (course.course_id, course.course_name, course.instructor.instructor_id if course.instructor else None))
        self.conn.commit()

        # Add the course to the internal list
        self.courses.append(course)

        dialog.close()
        self.refresh_treeview()






[docs]
    def refresh_treeview(self):
        self.table.setRowCount(0)  # Clear the table

        # Fetch Students from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM students")
        students = self.cursor.fetchall()
        for student in students:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Student"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(student[1]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(student[2])))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(student[0])))

        # Fetch Instructors from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM instructors")
        instructors = self.cursor.fetchall()
        for instructor in instructors:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Instructor"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(instructor[1]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor[2])))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor[0])))

        # Fetch Courses from the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM courses")
        courses = self.cursor.fetchall()
        for course in courses:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Course"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(course[1]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(""))  # No age for courses
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(course[0])))





[docs]
    def search_records(self):
        search_term = self.search_entry.text().lower()

        # Clear the table first
        self.table.setRowCount(0)

        # Search Students in the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT name, age, student_id FROM students WHERE LOWER(name) LIKE ? OR student_id LIKE ?", 
                            (f'%{search_term}%', f'%{search_term}%'))
        students = self.cursor.fetchall()
        for student in students:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Student"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(student[0]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(student[1])))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(student[2])))

        # Search Instructors in the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT name, age, instructor_id FROM instructors WHERE LOWER(name) LIKE ? OR instructor_id LIKE ?", 
                            (f'%{search_term}%', f'%{search_term}%'))
        instructors = self.cursor.fetchall()
        for instructor in instructors:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Instructor"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(instructor[0]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor[1])))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(instructor[2])))

        # Search Courses in the database
        self.cursor.execute("SELECT course_name, course_id FROM courses WHERE LOWER(course_name) LIKE ? OR course_id LIKE ?", 
                            (f'%{search_term}%', f'%{search_term}%'))
        courses = self.cursor.fetchall()
        for course in courses:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem("Course"))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(course[0]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(""))  # No age for courses
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(str(course[1])))





[docs]
    def delete_record(self):
        # Get the currently selected row
        selected_row = self.table.currentRow()

        if selected_row == -1:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Error", "Please select a record to delete.")
            return

        # Get the record type from the first column of the selected row
        record_type = self.table.item(selected_row, 0).text()
        record_id = self.table.item(selected_row, 3).text()

        # Confirm deletion
        confirm = QMessageBox.question(self, 'Confirm Deletion', f"Are you sure you want to delete this {record_type}?",
                                    QMessageBox.Yes | QMessageBox.No, QMessageBox.No)

        if confirm == QMessageBox.Yes:
            try:
                if record_type == "Student":
                    # Delete the student from the database
                    self.cursor.execute("DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = ?", (record_id,))
                    self.conn.commit()
                elif record_type == "Instructor":
                    # Delete the instructor from the database
                    self.cursor.execute("DELETE FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = ?", (record_id,))
                    self.conn.commit()
                elif record_type == "Course":
                    # Delete the course from the database
                    self.cursor.execute("DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_id = ?", (record_id,))
                    # Also delete all enrollments related to this course
                    self.cursor.execute("DELETE FROM course_enrollments WHERE course_id = ?", (record_id,))
                    self.conn.commit()

                # Remove the row from the table
                self.table.removeRow(selected_row)

                QMessageBox.information(self, 'Success', f'{record_type} deleted successfully.')

            except Exception as e:
                QMessageBox.critical(self, 'Error', f'An error occurred while deleting the record: {e}')






if __name__ == '__main__':
    app = QApplication(sys.argv)
    ex = SchoolManagementSystem()
    ex.show()
    ex.refresh_treeview()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())
